_header: All manner children ye listen and lere
Title(s): ‘Lesson of Wysedome for all Maner Chyldryn’
Subjects: children, instructions for behaviour of; manners, treatises on; courtesy books
_description: Symon’s ‘Lesson of Wysedome for all Maner Chyldryn’ — 102 lines

Bod832.First Lines:
All maner chyldryn ye lysten & lereA lessoun of wysedome
                    þat ys wryte here…
Bod832.Last Lines:
…Thys may ȝe al be ryght gode menGod graunt yow grace so
                    to preserue yow
Bod832.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Babees Book, etc.
EETS
         o.s. 32 (1868); rev. ed.  Early English Meals and
